publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1546 Ms Sandra White: Partick Healthy Living Centre—That the Parliament congratulates Partick Community Association and the West Glasgow Local Exchange Trading System on the award of almost £300,000 of lottery cash from the New Opportunities Fund, the first award from the Healthy Living Centre Programme to go to Glasgow; recognises that the facilities provided by the centre will be a tremendous asset for the community in Partick and the wider area and commends the work of the Partick Community Association volunteers who have made this possible. Supported by: Ms Margo MacDonald*, Alex Neil*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S1M-1546 Partick Healthy Living Centre (lodged on 16 January 2001) Michael Matheson*
S1M-1546 Partick Healthy Living Centre (lodged on 16 January 2001) Colin Campbell*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Tommy Sheridan*

Supported by: Ms Margo MacDonald, Alex Neil, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Nicola Sturgeon, Roseanna Cunningham, Michael Matheson, Colin Campbell, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Tommy Sheridan
S1M-1546 Partick Healthy Living Centre (lodged on 16 January 2001) Pauline McNeill*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Fiona McLeod*

S1M-1546 Partick Healthy Living Centre (lodged on 16 January 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Michael Russell*, Robert Brown*
